entry.title: Thursday: Rain at times heavy. High 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Rain at times heavy beginning this afternoon. Amount 10 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 70 gusting to 90 over exposed coastal sections early this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 50 gusting to 70 this afternoon. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers at times heavy. Temperature steady near 6.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy with risk of a thunderstorm. Amount 15 to 25 mm except 40 mm near Zeballos and Tahsis. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 over exposed coastal sections early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 09 February 2023
